Description:
Expressions of Interest
A breathtaking luxury on the water
With an abundance of truly memorable highlights from the inspired location right next to Point Park and the serene Yarra River, all the way to the stunning luxury and space youll find over two levels, this wonderful 3 bedroom + study, 2 bathroom townhouse is an irresistible Docklands offering.
This seldom offered modern oasis has all buyers in mind, from young professionals who want a base not far from work in the CBD or Southbank, to retirees on the hunt for a gorgeous downsizer. A ground level dazzles with a generous north-facing courtyard at the front of the property, which promises a tranquil space to enjoy the park views over dinners and weekend cocktails.
Inside, the spacious living and dining zone is adjoined by the immaculate stone kitchen which offers an island bench, great storage, and stainless steel appliances. 900mm Miele cooktop and oven will sure please the cook. Downstairs also promises a bedroom with BIR which sits next to the stylish bathroom and European laundry. The top level has two more bedrooms with BIRs including one with access to a north balcony, quality 2nd bathroom, and a study/home office with abundant storage which could also be a quaint 4th bedroom.
Other features include ducted heating and cooling, secure intercom, two secure car spaces, and access to Yarra Point facilities including a 300 sqm rooftop herb garden complete with BBQ facilities, plus a residents lounge, gym, and business centre. In addition to free access to RekDek facilities, include a gymnasium, 25m indoor heated lap pool, spa, sauna and steam room.
Nearby South Wharf restaurants will be a delight all year round, whether youre grabbing some beers and schnitzel at Munich Brauhaus or some tasty Pad Thai at the lively Bangpop. The redeveloped the District Docklands with Hoyts cinema, ArtVo 3D gallery and many more shops and restaurants will definitely delight the visitors. Other nearby attractions include Crown Entertainment Complex with world class restaurants, IGA X-Press supermarket, and Southbank, South Melbourne, and Port Melbourne attractions.
